alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 4:29PM CDT until June 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... West central Butler County in south central Kansas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Benton, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andover, Bel Aire, Towanda, Benton and Santa Fe Lake. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
